about_the_game:
Dear Detectives,

Hello! We are the development team of "Beyond the Mist and Mountains". We are delighted that this game can meet you all. The subsequent chapters of this game are still under development, and we hope that after playing, detectives can provide us with valuable suggestions to help us do better!

About this game:
"Beyond the Mist and Mountains" is a Japanese-style horror mystery puzzle-solving game, including puzzle-solving, hiding, chasing, visual novels and other gameplay; the game takes the plot as its core to present a series of mysterious yet touching stories. The currently open trial chapter tells about five years ago when a sophomore student named Mayu Igarashi took a midnight train to So-Kyo City to attend a social flash activity organized by an obscure supernatural forum. She disappeared after getting off at a station called "Kisaragi Platform", which has since vanished. Shizuno Yokoyama has never given up looking for her girlfriend Mayu. He opened a detective agency in his hometown specializing in "bizarre tasks", just searching for clues about Mayu's whereabouts. As his investigation deepened, he found himself increasingly entangled in this fog...

About gameplay:
In-game detectives can explore different maps, unlock different gameplay styles and make different choices as Shizuno Yokoyama which trigger completely different storylines.

Follow Us:
Official QQ Group Number: 924639075

We hope you detectives will like our work and give us plenty of suggestions on storyline, gameplay or anything... Bring it on! We can handle it! Everyone is welcome to join our group chat so we could discuss together with our main creators within it. Your suggestions will help us create an even better gaming experience!

name: OtherSide Of Mist And Mountain Demo
short_description: In 2005, a sophomore student named Igarashi Mahane took a private train to Soukyo City. She disappeared after alighting at a station named "Kisaragi". Five years later, her lover, Yokoyama Shizuno, began investigating the case and strange stories started to unfold one after another.
